column5: I was wearing sweaters and hoodies until it got time for me to try on my graduation dress. I was trying to hide my arm but my mom was helping me put it on.
They can be toxic but somehow show the most interest or give the most attention to you than any one else... maybe that’s just my experience.

My “friend” gets so upset with me if act boring or don’t add anything to a conversation. I don’t have much energy to give and I can’t think enough to be entertaining but I have to force myself so much so that I’m not alone.
